class.name: wxControl
class.description:
This is the base class for a control or "widget".

A control is generally a small window which processes user input and/or displays one or more item of data.

text.name: label
text.label: Label
text.description: Label to display on the control.

type.name: wxEVT_COMMAND_TEXT_COPY
type.description: Some or all of the controls content was copied to the clipboard.

type.name: wxEVT_COMMAND_TEXT_CUT
type.description: Some or all of the controls content was cut (i.e. copied and deleted).

type.name: wxEVT_COMMAND_TEXT_PASTE
type.description: Clipboard content was pasted into the control.
